title: Everyone vs everyone
body:
I was discussing with a friend about game modes and we agreed that it would be awesome if we did a everyone vs everyone mode. Wanna troll your team mates? You can now cos it's legal!
In this mode not only you can kill you enemies but also your friends!! Enter a game of alliance and betrayal xD

replies.body: The big question is how will the game start where will the champions respawn in the beginning of the game, and everytime they die, but it sounds awesome :)
So you want a Battle Royal?

Waitaminute, this isn't how it already works? 

:P
